snippet: The officials are unlikely to sign off on a long-delayed tranche of aid for Greece until they receive a report on the country's progress in meeting its fiscal goals.
abstract: Euro zone finance ministers meeting to confront specter of Greek debt are unlikely to rush release of long-delayed bailout package to country; are expected to await final report on reforms Greece has agreed to make as condition of two bailout packages totaling $305 billion.
lead_paragraph: The officials are unlikely to sign off on a long-delayed tranche of aid for Greece until they receive a report on the country's progress in meeting its fiscal goals.

headline.main: Euro Zone Finance Ministers to Wrestle With Greek Debt
headline.print_headline: European Officials to Meet on Greek Debt
